# AchievingCoach

> Professional coaching platform for organizations and individuals

## Main

- [Homepage](https://achievingcoach.com): AchievingCoach - Transform your coaching practice with AI-powered tools
- [About](https://achievingcoach.com/about): Learn about our mission to democratize professional coaching
- [Pricing](https://achievingcoach.com/pricing): Flexible plans for coaches, teams, and enterprises

## Product

- [Coaching Tools](https://achievingcoach.com/tools): 10+ professional coaching tools including GROW, DISC, Wheel of Life
- [Dashboard](https://achievingcoach.com/dashboard): Unified coaching dashboard for progress tracking
- [Sessions Management](https://achievingcoach.com/sessions): Schedule and manage coaching sessions
- [Goals Tracking](https://achievingcoach.com/goals): Set and track SMART goals with confidence levels
- [Reflections](https://achievingcoach.com/reflections): Journal and reflect on coaching journey

## For Coaches

- [Coach Dashboard](https://achievingcoach.com/coach): Manage clients, programs, and sessions
- [Client Management](https://achievingcoach.com/coach/clients): Track client progress and assign tools
- [ICF Simulator](https://achievingcoach.com/coach/icf-simulator): Practice ICF competencies
- [Programs](https://achievingcoach.com/coach/programs): Create structured coaching programs

## Features

- **Multi-tenant Architecture**: Separate workspaces for organizations
- **Role-Based Access**: Org Admin, Coach Admin, Supervisor, Coach, Coachee
- **Professional Coaching Tools**: GROW Worksheet, DISC Assessment, Wheel of Life, Values Clarification
- **Progress Tracking**: Goals, sessions, reflections, and tools completion
- **Enterprise Ready**: SSO, custom branding, unlimited users

## Technology

- **Frontend**: Next.js 14, React, Tailwind CSS
- **Backend**: Node.js, Express, TypeScript
- **Database**: Google Firestore
- **Authentication**: Firebase Auth
- **Hosting**: Google Cloud Run
- **AI Integration**: Ready for Claude API integration

## Plans

- **Starter**: $29/month - 2 coaches, 10 coachees, 5GB storage
- **Professional**: $99/month - 10 coaches, 100 coachees, 50GB storage
- **Enterprise**: Custom pricing - Unlimited users, custom integrations, SSO

## Use Cases

- **Corporate Coaching**: Employee development and leadership coaching
- **Executive Coaching**: C-suite and senior leadership development
- **Career Coaching**: Career transitions and professional development
- **Team Coaching**: Group coaching and team development
- **Life Coaching**: Personal development and goal achievement

## Integration

- **Calendar**: Google Calendar, Microsoft Outlook (planned)
- **Video**: Zoom, Microsoft Teams (planned)
- **CRM**: Salesforce integration (planned)
- **HRIS**: BambooHR, Workday (planned)

## Security & Compliance

- **Data Encryption**: AES-256 encryption at rest and in transit
- **SOC 2**: Type II compliance (in progress)
- **GDPR**: Full compliance with data protection
- **Backup**: Daily automated backups

## Contact

- **Email**: info@achievingcoach.com
- **Support**: support@achievingcoach.com
- **Sales**: sales@achievingcoach.com
- **Documentation**: https://docs.achievingcoach.com (planned)

## Company

Founded in 2025, AchievingCoach is revolutionizing professional coaching with technology. Our mission is to make high-quality coaching accessible to everyone through intuitive tools and AI-powered insights.

**Target Audience**: Professional coaches, corporate HR teams, coaching organizations, executives seeking development

**Competitive Advantages**: 
- Multi-tenant architecture from day one
- 10+ professional coaching tools included
- AI-powered insights (coming soon)
- Enterprise-grade security
- Affordable pricing for all organization sizes
